 2021-08502021-08-06,  ,  ,  ,  GAC,  IT
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder directing Export Development Canada
PrecisOrder directing Export Development Canada to perform any activity in accordance with any authorization obtained from the Minister for International Trade in respect of the Telesat program known as TELESAT LIGHTSPEED, enter into any agreements to provide support, and do all ancillary things that may be required or advisable to give effect to this directive.
AttachmentsAttachment
